1441
Miss Jeanne Lowe
-3-
December 27, 1951
I sincerely hope that this provides you with some more ideas*
jn let me say I will be very happy to write at greater length on
phase of the operation which is of interest to you. Do you want
information on physical facilities, equipment, number of tapes used,
so forth? Do you have enough information on the history of the
Network? Perhaps more questions will occur to you*
Cordially,
RLRtWC
Enclosures
Richard L* Rider
Manager
